# squidleplus

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

squidleplus provides an R interface to the [Squidle+ API](https://squidle.org/api/help?template=api_help_page.html).

Warning: this package is at a very early stage of development. Don't use it.

## Installation


```{r eval = FALSE}
## install.packages("remotes") ## if needed
remotes::install_github("AustralianAntarcticDivision/squidleplus")

```
